channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced Database Cleaner
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced Database Cleaner

item.title: CVE-2021-24921|2024-08-03T19:49:13.923Z -- unknown -- advanced%20database%20cleaner
item.description: The Advanced Database Cleaner WordPress plugin before 3.0.4 does not sanitise and escape $_GET keys and values before outputting them back in attributes, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issues

item.title: CVE-2022-2173|2024-08-03T00:32:08.615Z -- unknown -- advanced%20database%20cleaner
item.description: The Advanced Database Cleaner WordPress plugin before 3.1.1 does not escape numerous generated URLs before outputting them back in href attributes of admin dashboard pages, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting

item.title: CVE-2021-24141|2024-08-03T19:21:18.793Z -- unknown -- advanced%20database%20cleaner
item.description: Unvaludated input in the Advanced Database Cleaner plugin, versions before 3.0.2, lead to SQL injection allowing high privilege users (admin+) to perform SQL attacks.
